name: TV World (hech11)
description:
TV-World is a 3D collectathon platformer. Players control a character called Disco Dave. You explore big environments based on an exaggerated era or idea of the 70’s. You must find bottlecaps to help upgrade the player to continue to progress through the level.

In the level Dave has crashed his car and it's your job to help him get him out of his predicament.

This project was for a year 2 Games Art college project.
